content:
Create a Standalone Custom Lightning Web Component

Enable custom Lightning web components to act independently from an OmniScript by adding it to the OmniScript as a standalone component.

For information on the different ways to create a custom Lightning web component for OmniScript, see Create a Custom Lightning Web Component for OmniScript.

Requirements for Creating a Standalone Custom Lightning Web Component
Review and complete the requirements before you create a standalone custom Lightning Web component.
Create and Map Data Inside the Custom LWC Element
Construct additional data JSON nodes in the Custom LWC element and pass values down from the element into the new JSON nodes using the omniaggregate event.

Communicate from OmniScript to a Lightning Web Component
Custom LWC Element
Extend the OmniScriptBaseMixin Component
title: Creating Standalone Custom Lightning Web Components in OmniStudio
